replies.body: When I look closer, the demote one has a ban, this has been known for 6 hours. Both accounts attack a certain person or group of people, this again isn't simple banter, this is verbally attacking someone or a group of people. This account should be handled as an account name that is breaking the rules. I do not care who did it first, this action is done, the staff now have to act accordingly. It should be done from there.
